title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 102.2 - Legal base
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 102.2 - Legal base

State Regulations
(a) Section
5.05
of the

Mental Hygiene Law establishes the powers and the duties of the Inter-Office

Coordinating Council of the Department of Mental Hygiene. (b) Section
41.09
of
the Mental Hygiene Law authorizes local governments to appoint and remove
directors of the local governmental unit. Each director shall meet the
standards set forth in this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
102.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
